author: flo (tonebytone)
content:
My first thought was also of an old rifle! But after reading your explanation, then I could imagine a musical instrument. But as a door, it's fabulous. I've never seen hardware like this.

I agree that perhaps we should make "planned obsolescence" obsolete! Things of utility produced long ago often were things of beauty, too, and they kept that beauty as long as their owners cared for them.
